channel.title: QuickStart on Rocket
channel.description: Recent content in QuickStart on Rocket

item.title: Minimum Example
item.description: Before you write down any code. You need to import the package. import ( "github.com/dannypsnl/rocket" ) With Rocket, you will create a lots of handler function, here is a basic handler function with user-defined context. type User struct { Name string `route:"name"` Age uint64 `route:"age"` } func hello(u *User) string { return "Hello " + u.Name + ", your age is " + strconv.FormatUint(u.Age, 10) } How to let it work?
